Understanding PTSD

What is PTSD?

Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) is a mental health condition triggered by experiencing or witnessing a traumatic event. It's a normal response to abnormal circumstances.

• Intrusive memories: Flashbacks, nightmares

• Avoidance: Staying away from reminders

• Hypervigilance: Being constantly on guard

• Negative changes: In thinking and mood

Recovery is Possible

PTSD is treatable. With proper support, therapy, and tools like those provided here, many people recover completely and go on to live fulfilling lives.

• Evidence-based therapy: EMDR, CBT, CPT

• Grounding techniques: Managing symptoms

• Support systems: Family, friends, groups

• Self-care: Regular exercise, healthy habits

Need Professional Support?

While these tools can be helpful for managing symptoms, they're not a replacement for professional treatment. Consider speaking with our AI coach Elena, who specializes in trauma recovery.

💡 Reflective Writing Prompts

Emotional Awareness

• How am I feeling right now, and what might be causing these emotions?

• What patterns do I notice in my emotional responses this week?

• When did I feel most at peace today, and what was happening?

• What emotions am I avoiding, and why?

Growth & Learning

• What did I learn about myself today?

• How have I grown since beginning my healing journey?

• What challenge helped me become stronger?

• What would I tell someone facing similar struggles?

Gratitude & Positivity

• What moments of joy or laughter did I experience today?

• Who am I grateful for in my life, and why?

• What small victories can I celebrate this week?

• How did I show kindness to myself or others today?

Future & Goals

• What am I looking forward to, and how can I nurture that excitement?

• What steps can I take tomorrow to support my healing?

• How do I want to feel at the end of next month?

• What boundaries do I need to set to protect my peace?

By accessing and using Root Cause Power ("Platform"), you accept and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

Root Cause Power is an AI-powered healthcare platform that provides personalized health assessments, AI coaching, and wellness tracking tools. Our services are for informational and educational purposes only.

3. Medical Disclaimer

IMPORTANT: Root Cause Power does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The information and tools provided are for educational purposes only and should not replace professional medical consultation. Always consult qualified healthcare professionals for medical concerns.

4. Subscription Tiers & Pricing

  • Free Plan: 3 health assessments, basic dashboard access, limited AI coaching
  • Basic Pro ($9.99/month): 10 assessments, full dashboard, standard AI coaching sessions
  • Premium ($19.99/month): 25 assessments, advanced analytics, priority AI coaching
  • Enterprise ($49.99/month): Unlimited assessments, custom features, dedicated support

5. User Responsibilities

You agree to:

  • Provide accurate information during assessments

  • Respect the intellectual property of Root Cause Power

6. Data Privacy & Security

Your privacy is important to us. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal health information. Please review our Privacy Policy for detailed information about data collection and usage.

7. Limitation of Liability

Root Cause Power shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the platform, including but not limited to health decisions made based on platform recommendations.

8. Contact Information

Privacy Policy

Effective Date: September 19, 2025

1. Information We Collect

Root Cause Power collects information you provide directly, including:

  • Personal Information: Name, email address, account preferences
  • Health Assessment Data: Responses to health questionnaires and self-assessments
  • Usage Data: Platform interactions, feature usage, session duration
  • Communication Data: AI coaching conversations, support inquiries

2. How We Use Your Information

We use collected information to:

  • Provide personalized health insights and AI coaching recommendations
  • Improve our AI algorithms and platform functionality
  • Send service-related communications and updates
  • Ensure platform security and prevent misuse
  • Analyze platform performance and user experience

3. Information Sharing

We do NOT sell, trade, or rent your personal health information to third parties.

4. Your Privacy Rights

You have the right to access, correct, delete, and export your personal data. Use our Customer Support form for requests.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions

How accurate are the health assessments?

Our assessments use evidence-based questionnaires and AI analysis. They provide valuable insights but should supplement, not replace, professional medical evaluation.

Is my health data secure and private?

Yes! We use end-to-end encryption and follow strict privacy protocols. Your data is never sold to third parties.

Can I export my health data?

Absolutely! You can export your assessment results and progress data anytime from your dashboard.
